source: AIHSR Risk Reference Tool v1.5 (Tamiko Eto)

strategies.name: Board Structure & Oversight
strategies.description: Establish appropriate governance boards and oversight committees

strategies.name: Risk Management
strategies.description: Pre-deployment risk assessments, independent risk assessment

strategies.name: Conflict of Interest Protections
strategies.description: Identify and manage conflicts of interest in AI development and deployment

strategies.name: Whistleblower Reporting & Protection
strategies.description: Establish channels for reporting concerns with protection for reporters

strategies.name: Safety Decision Frameworks
strategies.description: Structured frameworks for making safety-related decisions

strategies.name: Environmental Impact Management
strategies.description: Assess and mitigate environmental impacts of AI systems

strategies.name: Societal Impact Assessment
strategies.description: Evaluate broader societal implications of AI deployment

strategies.name: Model & Infrastructure Security
strategies.description: Secure model storage, access controls, and infrastructure protection

strategies.name: Model Alignment
strategies.description: Ensure model behavior aligns with intended objectives and values

strategies.name: Model Safety Engineering
strategies.description: Design and implement safety features in model architecture

strategies.name: Content Safety Controls
strategies.description: Filters and controls to prevent harmful content generation

strategies.name: Testing & Auditing
strategies.description: Comprehensive testing and regular auditing of AI systems

strategies.name: Data Governance
strategies.description: Policies and procedures for data management and quality

strategies.name: Access Management
strategies.description: Control and monitor access to AI systems and data

strategies.name: Staged Deployment
strategies.description: Gradual rollout with checkpoints and evaluation

strategies.name: Post-Deployment Monitoring
strategies.description: Ongoing monitoring of AI performance after deployment

strategies.name: Incident Response & Recovery
strategies.description: Procedures for responding to and recovering from incidents

strategies.name: System Documentation
strategies.description: Comprehensive documentation of AI system design and behavior

strategies.name: Risk Disclosure
strategies.description: Clear communication of risks to stakeholders

strategies.name: Incident Reporting
strategies.description: Systems for reporting and tracking incidents

strategies.name: Governance Disclosure
strategies.description: Transparency about governance structures and decisions

strategies.name: Third-Party System Access
strategies.description: Controls for third-party access and integration

strategies.name: User Rights & Recourse
strategies.description: Mechanisms for users to understand and contest AI decisions

riskTypes.name: Distributional
riskTypes.description: Risks that affect how benefits and harms are distributed across groups

riskTypes.name: Interactional
riskTypes.description: Risks that arise from human-AI interaction

riskTypes.name: Systemic
riskTypes.description: Risks that affect broader systems and structures
